tool_description: Validate or GET username with ID. Available for Free Fire true ID, Mobile Legends true ID, PUBG Mobile true ID, Higgs Domino true ID, AoV true ID etc.
name: ID Game Checker
title: ID Game Checker

api_list.name: GET username Valorant
api_list.description: Enter the Valorant Riot ID and Tag in the required parameters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://id-game-checker.p.rapidapi.com/valorant/ucup/123"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "id-game-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://id-game-checker.p.rapidapi.com/valorant/{riot_id}/{tag}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "id-game-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
